H0.text: Las Vegas is situated in which US State. Arizona

A4.text: Las Vegas, colloquially referred to as Vegas, is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Nevada.

A5.text: Las Vegas is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Nevada.
